context_bundle.summary: When to script vs native: complex math/ML/image processing -> Python, JSON manipulation/data transform -> JavaScript, COM/AD/WMI -> VBScript. Performance: batch process in single script call, not loop of script calls

onboarding.quick_start: Use native actions first. Script only for: complex math, regex beyond native, ML, image processing, COM objects, AD queries. Return JSON from scripts for easy parsing.
common_patterns: VBScript COM: CreateObject("Excel.Application") for advanced Excel ops
VBScript WMI: GetObject("winmgmts:") for system info
VBScript AD: CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") with ADsDSOObject provider
known_errors: Script per loop iteration = slow. Batch entire list in one call
VBScript WScript.Echo for output, not print
Always wrap scripts in try-catch, return {success, error, data} JSON
